item.title: How to Zoom In and Out of the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Zoom In: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut With Menu With Fit to Screen How to Center to Selection How to Zoom Out: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut With Menu With Fit to Screen No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Zoom In With Click Step 1: First open a whiteboard template. In the lower right side click the “Zoom in " button.
